WHY CHOOSE PENNSYLVANIA LEADERSHIP CHARTER SCHOOL (PALCS)? Every child is different. At PALCS, we provide a unique and individualized approach to learning for every child. Online public charter school for any K-12 students in Pennsylvania. Ranked #1 Best Online School in PA for past three years. Students log

div.h3: WHY CHOOSE PENNSYLVANIA LEADERSHIP CHARTER SCHOOL (PALCS)?

div.p: Every child is different. At PALCS, we provide a unique and individualized approach to learning for every child.

li.div: Online public charter school for any K-12 students in Pennsylvania.

div.p: Ranked #1 Best Online School in PA for past three years.
Students log on every school day to complete online schoolwork.
Courses created and taught by certified, easy to reach teachers.

li.div: State of the art laptop, books and online resources are provided.

div.p: PALCS is a flexible, academically dynamic and award winning online school in PA.
